info.name: GoodPlay API
info.description: Complete API collection for GoodPlay backend testing

body.raw:
{
    "push_enabled": true,
    "email_enabled": false,
    "frequency": "daily",
    "achievement_alerts": true,
    "donation_confirmations": true,
    "friend_activity": false,
    "tournament_reminders": true,
    "maintenance_alerts": true
}

{
  "mode_type": "seasonal_war",
  "name": "Summer Championship 2024",
  "start_date": "2024-06-01T00:00:00Z",
  "end_date": "2024-08-31T23:59:59Z",
  "description": "Epic summer tournament with special rewards"
}

{
  "challenge_type": "1v1",
  "opponent_id": null,
  "game_id": "tetris",
  "difficulty": "medium",
  "description": "Let's see who's the best at Tetris!"
}

  "team_ids": ["fire_dragons", "ice_phoenix", "earth_guardians", "storm_eagles"],

}
